game.name: Papa’s Donuterias
game.description:
One of the finest works from Flipline Studios, Papa Donuteria is a good choice for cooking games lovers, especially for girls. Get ready to be boarded upon the most-awaited donut-cooking adventure by playing Papa Donuteria. 

So, you have got a job at the most popular restaurant named Papa Donuteria in the whimsical town of Powder Point. When you play this free online flash game, your primary job is to make your customers feel happy with the best possible services. This time-management game for girls is sure to improve your customer management and quick decision-making skills. 

The more your customers pay you, the better chances of improving your food quality will be. Remember, your customers are extremely crazy living in this carnival-like town, so your cooking skills would surely help you to cook and serve a good number of highly scrumptious donuts a day. Take care of while cutting out the donuts, frying them up and adoring them with a huge variety of toppings. This cool cooking game includes four stations: Order Station, Dough Station, Fry Station and Build Station.

You are working at the theme park where a new-brand roller coaster has been opened. All your days are going to be very busy and hectic when it comes to satisfying all the urges of your hungry customers who will visit the Papa Donuteria. Serving the freshly baked donuts to your customers is the only key to earn cash and win this newest cooking game.
